redeemCode.alreadyUsed: Given code has already been activated.

authentication.expired: Your authentication request may have expired. Please try again.
authentication.alreadyLinkedUser: Your account is already linked to an email address.
authentication.alreadyLinkedEmail: This email address is already linked to an account.
authentication.alreadyUsedEmail: Your account is already linked to this email address
authentication.invalidUserEmail: This email address is not linked to this user.
authentication.invalidDevice: You must authenticate on the same device you requested the code.
authentication.invalidUser: Your user account does not require authentication.
authentication.invalidSessionName: A session name must be between 2-24 characters and may only contain alphanumeric characters and spaces.
authentication.alreadyUsedSessionName: A session with this name already exists.

rateLimit.malicious: Malicious activity has been detected. Timed out for %{seconds} second(s).
rateLimit.secure: You hit the rate limit on this secure channel. Wait %{seconds} second(s).
rateLimit.generic: Slow down a little! Wait %{seconds} second(s).

generic.levelTooLow: Your level is not high enough to perform this action.
generic.differentSessionConnected: You logged in on %{session} and have been disconnected here.
generic.sameSessionConnected: You were disconnected here as you opened this site in another browser tab.
generic.blockedFrame: This game isn't allowed on this website. You can play it for free on the website listed below.
generic.unableToConnectToServer: Unable to connect to the game server. You may try refreshing this page later. Please reach out if the issue persists.
generic.desync: Sorry, it looks like you were desynchronized. Please try again.
generic.title: An error has occurred.
generic.invalidEmail: An invalid email address was given.
generic.invalidAction: An invalid action type "%{type}" was given.
generic.maintenance: You cannot perform this action while maintenance mode is active.
generic.missingArguments: Missing needed arguments for this action.
generic.cannotSelf: You cannot perform this action to yourself.
generic.actionAgainstBot: Cannot perform this action to a bot.
generic.againstAgainstInactiveUser: Cannot perform this action on an inactive user.
generic.invalidUser: User with given ID is not in this match.
generic.invalidTime: You cannot perform this action at this time.
generic.versionMismatch:
You are running version "%{client}" while the server is running version "%{server}". Please refresh this page in a few minutes to update to the latest version.

You can still play against the Computer with no issues, but we recommend updating before playing multiplayer.

config.displayOnly: Given config type "%{type}" cannot be modified.
config.max: Option "%{id}" has a max value of "%{max}".
config.min: Option "%{id}" has a min value of "%{min}".
config.minExceedMaxLength: Min. length cannot be more than the max. length.
config.maxSubceedMinLength: Max. length cannot be less than the min. length.

start.fieldRows: Selected field cannot support more than %{rows} rows
start.fieldCannotFitUsers: Selected field cannot support more than %{users} players
start.whiteCardThreshold: Game requires at least %{count} response cards (white)
start.blackCardThreshold: Game requires at least %{count} action cards (black)
start.insufficientPlayers: Need at least %{min} players to start the match.

game.velocity: Given velocity is outside of the permitted range.
game.missedTurnWarning: You were too late and your opponent was given their turn. If this happens too many times in a row you will be kicked. (%{current}/%{threshold})
game.missedTurnKick: You were kicked as you missed %{current} turn(s) in a row.
game.autoTurnWarning: You were too late and a move was made for you. If this happens too many times in a row you will lose. (%{current}/%{threshold})
game.autoTurnKick: You lost automatically as you were late for %{current} move(s) in a row.
game.insufficientRows: This field does not fit the amount of rows selected.
game.stuckSkip: Your turn was skipped as you cannot make any moves.
game.stuckThreshold: You were eliminated as you were stuck for %{moves} move(s) in a row.
game.allStuck: Nobody can make a move anymore. The match has concluded.
game.noRollsRemaining: There are no more remaining rolls.
game.incorrectValue: The value that was given does not match up with the expected one.
game.invalidVote: The vote you attempted to make is invalid.
game.cellClaimed: One or more cells in your selection have already been claimed.
game.colorClaimed: This color has been claimed by another user already.
game.invalidColumnRow: Column or row is not set or invalid.
game.invalidColumn: Column is not set or invalid.
game.invalidWord: The word given is not in the dictionary used.

card.loadingSets: Unable to download the card sets.
card.notInHand: You do not have this card in your hand.
card.loadError: An error occurred trying to download the card sets data.
card.underscore: Each underscore results in one response card pick — don't put them next to each other!
card.empty: Please make sure the card isn't empty.
card.pickLimit: Cannot request to pick more than 3 response cards. (Too many underscores?)
card.setSizeLimit: The total size of the custom card sets may not exceed %{limit}
card.setName: Name must be between 3 and 32 characters long

preset.alreadyApplied: This preset has already been applied.
preset.invalid: You cannot use "%{id}" as a preset.

match.empty: Match closed. All other players left the match.
match.rematchTimeout: You didn't accept the rematch request and were sent back to the main menu.
match.rematchCancelled: Sorry! There aren't enough players left for a rematch.
match.inactive: The match you were in has been closed as it has been inactive for too long.
match.inactiveWarning: Match will soon be closed due to inactivity unless action is taken.
match.replacedByBot: You were replaced by a bot and cannot rejoin this game.
match.kicked: You were kicked from the match you were in.
match.deleted: The match you were in has been deleted.
match.invalid: Match with ID "%{id}" does not exist.
match.computer: This is a match against the computer, you cannot join.
match.private: This is a private match. You must enter an ID to join.
match.startStop: You are unable to start or stop a game that is in progress.
match.inProgress: Match is already in progress. You may not join.

profile.profanity: Nickname appears to contain banned profanity.
profile.lockedPicture: Picture contains locked items that you may not use.
profile.nicknameAllowedCharacters: Nickname may only contain alphanumeric characters and these special characters ?!_-+
profile.inGame: Cannot customize your profile while the game is in progress

requirement.authentication: You cannot perform this action without having authenticated.
requirement.validAccount: Your account has not been validated yet. Please save your profile changes.
requirement.inLobby: You cannot perform this action as the match has already started.
requirement.notJudge: You cannot perform this action as the judge.
requirement.judge: You cannot perform this action as you are not the judge.
requirement.turn: You cannot perform this action as it is not your turn.
requirement.duringGame: You can only perform this action while the match is in progress.
requirement.finishedGame: You can only perform this action after the game has finished.
requirement.inGame: You must be in a game to perform this action.
requirement.notInGame: You cannot perform this action while you are in a game.
requirement.notMatchmaking: You cannot perform this action while you are matchmaking.
requirement.matchHost: You are not the host and cannot perform this action.
requirement.admin: This action is restricted to Admins.

generic.heading: Multiplayer Games You Can Find on Bloob.io
generic.title: Free Multiplayer Games Online | No Sign-Up Needed
generic.description: A collection of multiplayer browser-based games without the need to make an account. Play hassle free and customize the experience to your liking.

maxUsers.title: Max. Players
maxUsers.help: How many players are allowed in the match.

botCount.help: Introduce bots to your game along with other players.

winCondition.title: Winning Condition
winCondition.help: Determine when the game should come to a conclusion.

turnTime.title: Turn Time
turnTime.help: The amount of time a player has before their turn is given to the next player.

timeFreedomMode.title: Time Freedom Mode
timeFreedomMode.help: Play without time limits. Disable all turn timers and enjoy a relaxed gameplay experience where you can play at your own pace. Not recommended against random opponents.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Changes made by you — Last updated %{timestamp}

timeFreedom.title: Time Freedom
description: No timers
Wait until everyone is ready

WORDRACE.name: Wordrace
WORDRACE.heading: Play a Unique Word Finding Game
WORDRACE.tooltip: Find words in any direction on a randomly generated field while racing against others with the same objective.
WORDRACE.description: Wordrace is a free to play unique word finding game with customisable settings to give every player a challenge. It doesn't require any sign-up. Play now.
WORDRACE.title: Unique Multiplayer Word Game | Bloob.io

help.enabled: Enabled: Everyone finds words in the language you set.
help.disabled: Disabled: Each player selects a language of their choosing.

help.intro: The language everyone has to try to find words in.
help.globalLanguage: If the Global Language is disabled each player can select a language of their choosing.

sharedField.title: Shared Field
sharedField.help: Everyone always sees the same field. If a field is shared, it means when a letter has been claimed nobody else can take it. This way the game gets more difficult over time.

multiplier.title: Multipliers
multiplier.help: Multipliers are attached to random letters on the field and multiply the score of a found word if used in the selection.

roundTotal.title: Rounds
roundTotal.help: Each round will generate a new playing field.

roundDuration.title: Round Duration
roundDuration.help: How long a single round lasts.

roundIntermission.title: Intermission Time
roundIntermission.help: How long the time in between rounds lasts.

minWordLength.title: Min. Word Length
minWordLength.help: A word selection must have at least this length in order to be checked on validity.

maxWordLength.title: Max. Word Length
maxWordLength.help: A word selection cannot exceed this length in order to be checked on validity.

_wordLength.title: Word Length
_wordLength.help: A word selection must be between this length to be considered valid.

help.change: The size of the playing field. Bigger fields make playing with more people easier.
help.notice: Please note that large field sizes increase the interface size and may not fit the browser window for all players.

party.title: Party
description: Big field
Individual languages

blitz.title: Blitz
description: Many short rounds
Lots of multipliers

solo.title: Solo
description: Everyone has their own field

find_word.title: Word Selection
description: Click and hold on a letter in the playing field and drag in any direction to form a word.
Once you stop clicking, the word is processed, and you get points depending on the length of the word.

gameplay.title: Gameplay
description: Everyone is trying to find words at the same time as you, it is a race after all. Claimed letters cannot be used again.
Sometimes it is more tactical to claim many short words, rather than taking the time for longer ones.

multiplier.title: Multipliers
description: When enabled, multipliers are shown on random letters on the field which multiply the score of your found words!
Multipliers do stack up, so having a word with x2 and x3 would multiply the score for the word x5!

language.title: Language
description: The host gets to decide if everyone plays in the same language or one of their choosing.
Words will only be valid for the language you are playing in and any accents are ignored.

FOUR_IN_A_ROW.name: Four in a Row
FOUR_IN_A_ROW.heading: Connect Four in a Row Online With Friends
FOUR_IN_A_ROW.tooltip: Play Four in a Row with up to six players in either the classic gamemode or available variations.
FOUR_IN_A_ROW.description: Four in a Row is a casual free to play game. Play this classic connect four game with up to 6 friends at once in this fun, addictive, and easy-to-learn game.
FOUR_IN_A_ROW.title: Easy Free Multiplayer Game | Bloob.io

field.title: Field Size
field.help: The size of the playing field.

piecesInRow.title: Winning Condition
piecesInRow.help: How many pieces you must have in a row to win the game.

sideColumns.title: Side Columns
sideColumns.help: Adds a column on either side of the playing field with pieces in alternating colors.

flip.title: Field Flip
flip.help: Spice things up by flipping the field, the tiles on the bottom will become the tiles on top. A counter will show how many turns are left until a flip occurs.

turnsUntilFlip.title: Turns to Flip
turnsUntilFlip.help: Placing a piece counts as a turn. This defines how many pieces must be dropped before flipping the field.

tetrisMode.title: Tetris Mode
tetrisMode.help: When enabled, a fully filled row will disappear and drop all pieces above down a line. This also makes it impossible to tie in a game.

fiveInARow.title: Five-in-a-row
description: Side columns
Large field

flipParty.title: Flip Party
description: Flip field every 13 turns
Very large field

placement.title: Piece Placement
description: Pieces can be placed several ways. Hover over a column and click, use keyboard controls, or drag it around.
You can see which column your opponent is hovering over, keep this in mind and use it to your advantage.

win.title: Winning State
description: By default, the first person to get four on a row wins the game. This can be horizontal, vertical, and diagonal.
The host may change the default winning condition and allow for different requirements.

ROTTEN_APPLES.name: Rotten Apples
ROTTEN_APPLES.heading: Play an Online Multiplayer Cards Against Humanity With Friends
ROTTEN_APPLES.tooltip: Play a Cards Against Humanity clone and customize your experience to your liking.
ROTTEN_APPLES.description: Play a Cards Against Humanity clone and customize your experience to your liking. Create your own custom card sets and include them in your next match.
ROTTEN_APPLES.title: Multiplayer Cards Against Humanity | Bloob.io

data.first: First to get 0 points | First to get 1 point | First to get {count} points
data.most: Most points after 0 rounds | Most points after 1 round | Most points after {count} rounds

handSize.title: Hand Size
handSize.help: The amount of response cards everyone holds in their hand at any given time.

judgeSystem.title: Judge System
judgeSystem.help: Either a judge or everyone gets to determine who had the best play each round.

pickBlackCard.title: Pick Action Card
pickBlackCard.help: When turned on, three random action cards are shown to the judge to pick between.

handPreview.title: Hand Preview
handPreview.help: When turned on, a period is added at the start of the game and after every dump round. During this time everyone can take a look at their (new) cards in their hand.

dumpRound.title: Dump Round
dumpRound.help: A dump round allows everyone to select cards in their hand they would like to remove. New response cards are given as replacement after the round ends.

data.round: Every 0 rounds | Every 1 round | Every {count} rounds

showSpecific.title: Specific Cards
showSpecific.help: Cards containing brands, difficult words, or people.

_filter.title: Filter
_filter.help: Active filters result in cards that fit the following criteria to be left out:

timePicking.title: Action Card Picking Time
timePicking.help: Define how long everyone has to pick the action card to play.

responseCardLimit.title: Response Card Limit
responseCardLimit.help: By default action cards can request you to draw up to 3 response cards. By changing this limit action cards requesting more than this limit will be filtered out of the game.

help.intro: Define how long everyone will have to make their response card selection.
help.calc: The total time is calculated as RESPONSE CARDS * THIS TIME

help.intro: Define how long everyone will have to vote for the winning card selection.
help.calc: The total time is calculated as RESPONSE CARDS * PLAYERS * THIS TIME

help.intro: Define how long everyone gets to see the winning selection.
help.calc: The total time is calculated as RESPONSE CARDS * THIS TIME

help.intro: Define how long at the start of a game or after a dump round everyone gets to look at their (new) cards.
help.calc: The total time is calculated as 3 SECONDS + HAND CARDS * THIS TIME

help.intro: Define how long everyone has to select which cards they'd like to dump.
help.calc: The total time is calculated as 3 SECONDS + HAND CARDS * THIS TIME

blitz.title: Blitz
description: Small hand size
1 card response only

action.title: Action Card
description: Each round a new black action card is presented which has blanks (___) to be filled in by those playing.
Blanks are filled in using the white response cards in your hand. Once all players are ready, the judge picks their favorite response.

move.title: Response Cards
description: Your hand will show you your response cards. You can drag these into available slots or click to select them.
After each round the cards you used in your selection are swapped for new ones.

vote.title: Voting
description: Voting is either done by a single judge or by everyone. This depends on how the host configured the game.
At the end of each round, the judge(s) get to vote for their favorite response. A point is awarded to the winner.

sets.title: Card Sets
description: Before the game starts, the host can choose out of many available sets or import custom ones.
Custom card sets can be imported and are saved to your account, allowing you to easily use them again later.

CHECKERS.name: Checkers
CHECKERS.heading: Play Draughts Online With Friends
CHECKERS.tooltip: Call it checkers or draughts, play it here with up to 4 players with all kinds of customisable rules.
CHECKERS.description: Checkers is the classic fast-paced board game you know and love with exciting twists! Be in control and alter the rules as you like. Play with friends now.
CHECKERS.title: Classic Multiplayer Board Game | Bloob.io

help.enabled: Enabled: When possible, the player will be forced to take an opponent's piece.
help.disabled: Disabled: The player can choose what move they make, even if they can take out an opponent's piece.

field.title: Field
field.help: The playing field used. Depending on the size of the field and the amount of rows, you will get more or less starting pieces. Some fields may support up to four players.

winCondition.help: How the winner will be determined.

kingCondition.title: King Condition
kingCondition.help: Under what condition a piece becomes kinged. A kinged piece is allowed to move in all directions.

backwardsTake.title: Take Backwards
backwardsTake.help: Set whether pieces are allowed to take over opponent pieces backwards. If disabled, this can only be done by kinged pieces.

chainTake.title: Chain Take
chainTake.help: When enabled a piece can take over several other pieces in one move, if they are spaced properly. Alternatively when disabled only one piece can be taken at a time.

staleCount.title: Stale Game
staleCount.help: After how many turns without any take overs the game should be considered stale and ended.

stuckThreshold.title: Stuck Threshold
stuckThreshold.help: If a player is stuck for this amount of turns in a row they will lose automatically.

autoTurnThreshold.title: Late Threshold
autoTurnThreshold.help: If a player is late and a move is automatically made for them this number of turns in a row, they automatically lose.

rows.title: Rows
rows.help: How many rows of pieces each player starts with. Depending on the field size the amount of rows will be determined.

movement.title: Piece Movement
description: Pieces can be moved diagonally. When it is your turn, all pieces that you can move are highlighted.
You can click on a highlighted piece to see all possible moves available for that piece.

take.title: Takes
description: If an opponent's piece is diagonally next to your piece with an open spot behind it, you can take it.
Depending on the settings, you are either forced to take pieces when possible or can even take backwards.

king.title: Kinged Pieces
description: Under the default settings, when you reach the opposite side with a piece it becomes kinged.
Kinged pieces are able to move in all diagonal directions without being forced to move forward.

goal.title: Goal
description: Typically the goal is to take out all other pieces from the opponent or until no valid moves can be made.
The goal of the game, also referred to as the win condition, can be changed in the settings.

BLOMBER.name: Blomber
BLOMBER.heading: Play Bomberman Online With Friends
BLOMBER.tooltip: Blow up your opponents in an intense close quarters battlefield packed with power ups in this classic Bomberman game.
BLOMBER.description: Blomber is a Bomberman multiplayer game with more replayability than most other games. It's free, easy to play, customisable, and requires no sign-up. Play now.
BLOMBER.title: Bomberman Multiplayer Game | Bloob.io

field.title: Field
field.help: The playing field used. Bigger field sizes can accommodate more players.

data.LAST_STANDING: Last standing (0 lives) | Last standing (1 live) | Last standing ({count} lives)
data.KILL_COUNT: First to get 0 kills | First to get 1 kill | First to get {count} kills
data.TIME: Most kills after 0 min. | Most kills after 1 min. | Most kills after {count} min.

defaultBombCount.title: Bomb Count
defaultBombCount.help: This is the amount of bombs a player can place at the same time.

defaultBombSize.title: Bomb Size
defaultBombSize.help: This is the blast radius of a bomb. The size is measured in tiles in each direction.

respawnDelay.title: Respawn Time
respawnDelay.help: The time the player has to wait after they are killed before they can play again.

bombPush.title: Bomb Push
bombPush.help: When enabled, you can walk into a bomb to push it and slide it in a direction.

explosionDelay.title: Explosion Delay
explosionDelay.help: The delay before a placed bomb will explode.

chainReaction.title: Chain Reaction
chainReaction.help: When enabled, an explosion will trigger bombs within range to also explode. The kills will go to the player who placed the bomb that initiated the chain reaction. If disabled, these bombs will be removed instead.

cratePercentage.title: Crates
cratePercentage.help: The percentage of crates that will be shown on the playing field. Crates can be blown up and may contain power-ups.

powerUpPercentage.title: Power-ups
powerUpPercentage.help: Modify how likely it is that a power up is dropped when a crate is destroyed.

default.title: Default
description: 9x9 field
3 lives
Max. 4 players

party.title: Party
description: QR Square field
6 lives
Max. 8 players

action.title: Action Packed
description: No crates
Quick respawn
6 lives
Max. 8 players

EIGHT_BALL_POOL.name: 8 Ball Pool
EIGHT_BALL_POOL.heading: Play 8 Ball Pool Online With Friends
EIGHT_BALL_POOL.tooltip: Play the popular billiards game here against a bot or player.
EIGHT_BALL_POOL.description: Take your best shot in online multiplayer pool! Sink all your balls and finish with the 8 Ball to win at the table!
EIGHT_BALL_POOL.title: Free Multiplayer Game for 2 Players

preview.title: Preview
preview.help: The preview line shows where the cue ball will go after it has been hit.

ruleContactRailOnBreak.title: Rail on Break
ruleContactRailOnBreak.help: While breaking, determine how many balls must come in contact with the rail. This rule does not apply if you pocket a ball.

assignedGroup.title: Assigned Group
assignedGroup.help: Determine how each player is assigned their group (solids or stripes).

ruleTurnCanHitBall.title: Can Hit Ball
ruleTurnCanHitBall.help: Occurs when the player hits a ball that they are not allowed to. Rule does not apply while breaking.

ruleTurnMustHitBall.title: Must Hit Ball
ruleTurnMustHitBall.help: Occurs when the player does not hit a ball (from "Can Hit Ball") during their turn.

ruleTurnContactRail.title: Must Contact Rail
ruleTurnContactRail.help: Occurs when no ball hits the rail (cushion). This rule does not apply if the player pockets a ball.

ruleConsecutiveFouls.title: Consecutive Fouls
ruleConsecutiveFouls.help: Determine what should happen when a player makes multiple fouls in a row. This rule discourages unsportsmanlike behaviour.

help.disabled: Foul is disabled with current settings.

data.resetHand: End turn + Restore field + Ball in hand

foulPocketCueBall.title: Pocketing Cue Ball
foulPocketCueBall.help: Occurs when a player pockets the Cue Ball.

foulPocketOpponentBall.title: Pocketing Opponent's Ball
foulPocketOpponentBall.help: Occurs when a player pockets the opponent's ball. Other fouls take precedent over this (e.g. striking the incorrect ball first).

foulPocketOwnAndOpponentBall.title: Pocketing Own + Opponent's Ball
foulPocketOwnAndOpponentBall.help: Occurs when a player pockets both one of their own and the opponent's ball. Other fouls take precedent over this (e.g. striking the incorrect ball first).

foulIllegalEightBallBreak.title: Pocketing 8 Ball During Break
foulIllegalEightBallBreak.help: Occurs when a player manages to pocket the 8 Ball during the break.

foulIllegalEightBallPocket.title: Pocketing 8 Ball Illegally
foulIllegalEightBallPocket.help: Occurs when a player pockets the 8 Ball while committing a different foul at the same time (e.g. pocketing the cue ball as well).

foulIllegalEightBallPocketTooSoon.title: Pocketing 8 Ball Too Soon
foulIllegalEightBallPocketTooSoon.help: Occurs when a player pockets the 8 Ball while they still have other object balls to pocket.

wpa.title: WPA Ruleset
wpa.description: Closely resembles World Pool-Billiard Association rules

upa.title: UPA Ruleset
upa.description: Closely resembles US Professional Poolplayers Association rules

ruthless.title: Ruthless Ruleset
ruthless.description: Any foul will result in an instant loss

field.title: Playing Field
description: The field contains 6 holes in which the balls can be pocketed. There are a total of 16 balls, one of which is the cue ball that you strike on your turn.

There are 7x striped and 7x solid balls, as well as 1x black eight ball. At the start of the game all balls are positioned in a triangle with the eight ball in the middle. The cue ball is set further away.

breaking.title: Starting the game (Breaking)
description: Whoever has their turn first can move around the cue ball and strike towards the triangle of balls (their starting position).

There are rules to breaking. The cue ball cannot be pocketed and at least two balls (except for the cue ball) must hit a cushion (the walls around the field). Pocketing a ball on break guarantees you another turn right after.

gameplay.title: Gameplay
description: There are both striped and solid balls. Whoever pockets a ball first becomes that ball group and gets another turn. From that point forward you must only pocket striped or solid balls.
The order in which you pocket your balls does not matter. When you commit a foul your opponent will be allowed to move the cue ball around for their turn.

objective.title: Objective
description: You must avoid pocketing the black eight ball up until you have pocketed all your balls. You then finish the game by pocketing the eight ball. It is important you commit no foul while doing so, otherwise you lose.
Pocketing the eight ball too soon will result in an instant loss. Make sure to aim carefully!

YACHT.name: Yacht
YACHT.heading: Play Yacht, the Classic Dice Game Online
YACHT.tooltip: Play the popular Yacht game here against up to 4 bots or players.
YACHT.description: Play Yacht, the classic dice game also known as Yahtzee or Yatzy, with friends on Bloob.io. Roll, score, and win together!
YACHT.title: Free Multiplayer Dice Game

rolls.title: Rolls
rolls.help: How many rolls the user gets before they must make a selection.

speed.title: Speed
speed.help: How fast the dice roll animation is played.

addedRollTime.title: Added Time
addedRollTime.help: How much time is added after each roll. Will never exceed the turn time.

upperBonus.title: Upper Bonus
upperBonus.help: Whether players should receive an bonus points as a reward for reaching a threshold of points in the upper section.

upperBonusThreshold.title: Threshold
upperBonusThreshold.help: The total points required in the upper section categories to earn the upper bonus reward.

upperBonusReward.title: Reward
upperBonusReward.help: The amount of points awarded to those who cross the threshold of points.

additionalYacht.title: Additional Yacht
additionalYacht.help: Specify how the game should handle a situation where a player rolls another Yacht after already scoring points for one.

additionalYachtReward.title: Reward
additionalYachtReward.help: The amount of points awarded to those who roll yet another Yacht.

objective.title: Understanding the Objective
description: The goal of Yacht is to score the most points by rolling specific combinations of dice.
Familiarise yourself with the game interface. There is a dice area, a scorecard, and a button to roll the dice.

rolling_dice.title: Rolling Dice
description: At the start of your turn, you can press the 'Roll Dice' button or click and drag on the dice to roll them.
By default, each player gets 3 dice rolls per turn.

holding_dice.title: Holding Dice
description: After your first roll, click on any dice to "hold" it. The held dice won't change in your next roll. Click on the dice again to put them back in.
For example, if you roll three 6s in your first roll, hold them. Then roll the remaining dice to try for more 6s and increase your score.

earning_points.title: Earning Points
description: The scorecard contains several categories. Each category has different requirements.
You can hover over a category in the scorecard to see what the requirements are and how many points they can earn you.

picking_category.title: Picking a Category
description: After you roll the dice, the scorecard shows how many points you can get in different categories. Try to pick the one with the most points!
Click on the orange entry to choose your score and get points.

bonus.title: Bonus
description: If the upper section score sums up to 63 or more, you will get a bonus 35 points!
A Yacht will instantly give you 50 points. Got another Yacht after that? Use it in an entry scoring you any points and earn an additional 100 points!

tips.title: Tips
description: You can also click on an empty orange entry and get 0 points. This can be helpful if your only other option would give you very little points for that category.
This can be helpful in case you want to go for the bonus in the upper section for example.

BATTLESHIP.name: Pirate Battle: Ships Ahoy
BATTLESHIP.heading: Engage in Epic Ship Battles Online - Play Pirate Battle: Ships Ahoy
BATTLESHIP.tooltip: Command your fleet and conquer the high seas in this thrilling online Battleship game.
BATTLESHIP.description: Master tactical battleships, sink enemies, and conquer the seas in Pirate Battle: Ships Ahoy! Engage in epic multiplayer ship battles today.
BATTLESHIP.title: Conquer the Seas - Play Pirate Battle: Ships Ahoy Now

placementTime.title: Placement Time
placementTime.help: How long each player has to move their ships into position.

missedTurnThreshold.title: Missed Turn Threshold
missedTurnThreshold.help: How many turns can a player miss in a row before being kicked out of the game.

gridSize.title: Grid Size
gridSize.help: Select the size of the level size to play in.

level.title: Map
level.help: Select the map you would like to play in.

levelOrientation.title: Orientation
levelOrientation.help: Select the orientation the level will be displayed in.

shipSpacing.title: Ship Spacing
shipSpacing.help: When enabled, ships must have at least one cell between them and cannot touch each other directly.

shipReveal.title: Ship Reveal
shipReveal.help: When enabled, you will see the ship when you have sunk it. When disabled, only a counter with remaining ships is shown.

SUPER_TIC_TAC_TOE.name: Super Tic-Tac-Toe
SUPER_TIC_TAC_TOE.heading: Challenge Friends with Super Tic-Tac-Toe
SUPER_TIC_TAC_TOE.tooltip: Play the Super Tic-Tac-Toe game here against a bot or player.
SUPER_TIC_TAC_TOE.description: Experience the online multiplayer Super Tic-Tac-Toe game! Play with friends or against bots and master the grid! No sign-up required. Join the fun today!
SUPER_TIC_TAC_TOE.title: Online Multiplayer Game

winFallback.title: Win Fallback
winFallback.help: In case of a tie, player with more won fields wins.

gridCascade.title: Grid Cascade
gridCascade.help: When a player wins a small grid, all other incomplete grids on the board are instantly cleared.

blitz.title: Blitz
description: Short rounds
Cascading grids

objective.title: Understanding the Objective
description: The objective is to win by getting three of your symbols (X or O) in a line (horizontal, diagonal, or vertical) on the larger 3x3 grid.
Players take turns placing their symbols in smaller 3x3 grids.

twist.title: The Twist
description: Your move dictates which smaller grid your opponent must play in next, which is also highlighted as you hover over each grid cell.

win.title: Winning
description: The first to get three of their symbols in a line on the larger grid wins. In the event of a tie,whoever has won more smaller grids wins the game.

message.staleMoves: Match staled — %{staleCount} moves with no take over
message.forfeit: Match finished — Opponent chose to forfeit
message.late: Match ended due to missing %{turns} turn(s)

placeholder.cardSetName: Fill in name for this card set...

status.matchesWaiting: 0 matches waiting | 1 match waiting | {count} matches waiting

count.selectedCards: No cards selected | 1 card selected | {count} cards selected
count.matchesFound: 0 matches found | 1 match found | {count} matches found
count.matchesWaiting: 0 matches waiting | 1 match waiting | {count} matches waiting
count.needMorePlayers: Need 0 more players | Need 1 more player | Need {count} more players
count.playAgainstBots: Play Against Bots | Play Against a Bot | Play Against Bots
count.playRandomOpponents: Play Random Opponents | Play Random Opponent | Play Random Opponents
count.turnsToFlip: Turns to flip | Turn to flip | Turns to flip
count.increment: Increments of 0 | Increment of 1 | Increments of {count}
count.shipsRemaining: 0 ships remaining | 1 ship remaining | {count} ships remaining

editor.title: Card Editor
editor.name: Card Set Name
editor.contentUnderscore: Use _ to mark a space for response cards

sets.title: Card Sets
sets.importById: Import card sets by ID (from third parties)

info.emptyFolder: No card sets have been shared here yet.
info.emptyList: Your custom card sets will show up here.
info.emptyListNotHost: The host has not selected any custom card sets.
info.noneSelected: The host must select card sets.
info.notInOwnLibrary: This custom card set was added by another user. You can add it to your library to use it again in the future.
info.csv: Please note CSV file support is limited and the resulting card set may not be flawless. For best results please use the native .json files (same as export).
info.delete: Deleting custom card set named "%{name}" cannot be undone. Download the set locally first if you wish to be able to recover it at a later time.
info.storage: Card sets are stored in your browser. Keep them safe by downloading a copy and saving it on your device.
info.notHost: Your imported cards are hidden, as you are not the host.
info.sizeLimit: Each custom card set takes up an amount of available storage. For performance reasons, a single game cannot use more than %{size} of custom card sets at a time.
info.filterDisclaimer: Please note that this filter can only be guaranteed for official card sets. Custom sets may not work with this filter.

info.pickAction: Pick an action card for this round
info.judgePickingActionCard: Judge %{name} is picking an action card
info.waitForSelections: You are the judge this round — wait for everyone to make their picks
info.preview: Take a moment to look at your (new) cards
info.dump: Select any cards you'd like to dump
info.delete: You are about to delete card "%{info}".
info.actionResponseCardCounter: Action & response card counter. Some sets use the same cards; duplicates are removed automatically. Filtering NSFW or Specific Cards also reduces the total amount.

lobby.waiting: Waiting for host to start the match

info.makeHost: You are about to make "%{name}" the new host.
info.kickUser: You are about to kick "%{name}" from this match.
info.noMatches: New matches will show up here
info.rematch: Would you like to play again?
info.rematchWaiting: Waiting for other player to accept rematch...
info.joinById: You can join a (private) match by filling in the four-digit ID.
info.public: Public: Anyone can join by browsing the available matches.
info.private: Private: Players can only join using the URL or 4-digit ID.
info.leave: You may not be able to join back if you choose to leave.
info.leaveLast: Since you are the only person in the game, the match will be closed when you leave.
info.leaveAsHost: Somebody else will become the new host when you leave.

info.accountLinkSuggestion: You are now %{level}! Consider creating an account to protect your progress.
info.accountLinked: This account is linked to the following email address: %{email}.
info.incompleteTranslationNotice: The language you have selected is roughly {percentage}% complete. Any missing translations will be in English.
info.betaNotice: This game is still being developed. Please share feedback & bugs on our %{social}
info.howToPlay: Learn how to play this game
info.skipStepOverHalf: This step can also be skipped if over half the users vote to.
info.skipStepAll: This step can also be skipped if all users vote to.
info.voteReduceTime: The remaining time is automatically reduced when everyone has voted.
info.interfaceAutoResize: Resizes the interface to fit field
info.opponentMissedTurn: It is now your turn as your opponent ran out of time.
info.localPlay: Share the same device with multiple people by adding local players.
info.highPing: The ping is the time it takes for you to communicate with the server. You are seeing everything later than other players and may experience jitter and delays.
info.hasBots: This game can be played against bots.
info.inactiveUser: User is not connected to this match.
info.sendFirstMessage: Be the first to send a message!
info.forfeit: Forfeiting the game will result in a loss for you.
info.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes which will be erased if you proceed.
info.accountDeletion: Deleting your account is irreversible and will clear your profile, progress, and statistics.
info.notMeWarning: By proceeding you will be logged out and redirected to a page that allows you to log out on all devices. After this you can login again like you would normally.
info.matchesDisabled: You cannot make or join a match right now
info.fileUpload: Click to browse or drag your file(s) in here
info.fileUploadMore: Add more files by dragging or clicking here
info.customizePreset: customize this preset to your liking.

redeemCode.title: Redeem Code
redeemCode.description: Enter a unique code below to unlock special items for even more customization. Each code can only be used once.
redeemCode.unlinked: Sorry, you cannot redeem a code until you have linked your account to an email address.
redeemCode.success: You have claimed the %{perk} perk successfully!
redeemCode.expiration: The code is valid for %{activationDuration} and your perk will expire on %{expirationDate}.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Experience (XP) is awarded at the end of a match. Reaching certain XP thresholds will level you up and help you unlock new titles.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Statistics are tracked per game and match. They can give you or others insights in how well you are performing.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Bloob.io anonymously tracks analytics using a privacy-friendly, self-hosted Matomo analytics server. Your data is never shared with others. You may opt out if you wish.
analytics.blocked: Analytics are not active. Your browser or extension may have blocked it.
analytics.dnt: Your browser has the "Do Not Track" (DNT) setting enabled. We honor your request and are not tracking you.

serverData.title: Server Data
serverData.description: You can see all your stored data on Bloob.io below. Sensitive info like an email address and secret keys may be hidden for your security.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: Browser data (e.g. language, volume settings) is stored in your browser's 'localStorage', not on our server.

myDevices.description: View and control which devices you are logged in on. You are also able to rename your current device for your convenience.
myDevices.noOtherDevices: No other devices are logged in. Did you know you can switch between devices in the middle of any game?
myDevices.unlinked: You have not yet created an account or logged in and your user can only be accessed on this device.

login.title: Login
login.description: Please note logging into your account will clear all progress for the user you are currently using (%{name}).

setupThreshold.title: You're early %{name}!
setupThreshold.description: You must be %{level} or higher to make an account. You are %{percentage} on your way there!

setup.title: Hi, %{name}!
setup.description: Create an account with just your email address to keep your progress safe and synced across all your devices. No password needed!
setup.disclaimer: We only use your email address to verify your account and log you in. Remove your email address anytime.

unlink.title: Remove Email Address
unlink.description: You are about to remove your email address from your %{name} account. Your progress will no longer be synchronized and you will only be able to access your user on this device.

unlinkSuccess.title: Email Address Removed
unlinkSuccess.description: Your email address has been removed from your account. This user can now only be accessed on this device.

transferStart.title: Update Your Email Address
transferStart.description: To change the email address linked to %{name}, please verify the current email address below. Once verified, you can enter the new email address.

transferConfirm.title: New Email Address
transferConfirm.description: Great news %{name}! Your current email address has been verified successfully. To complete the process, please provide your new email address below.

transferSuccess.title: Email Address Changed
transferSuccess.description: The email address linked to your account has been changed. For your security, you have been logged out on all other devices and will need to login again with your new email address.

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: As you have an account, your progress will be saved and can be retrieved by logging back in with your email address.

logoutGlobally.title: Logout Everywhere
logoutGlobally.description: This will log your account out of all devices including this one.

logoutSuccess.title: Logged Out
logoutSuccess.description: Your account has been logged out on this device. You can log back in using your email address.

relogin.title: Welcome back, %{name}!
relogin.description: You were logged out. Use your email address to gain access again.

ready.title: You're all set, %{name}!
ready.description: Your progress is now saved and synchronized!

authentication.loginNoAccount: Login with your email address below to access your account on this device.
authentication.logoutGloballyCompleted: Your account has been logged out from all devices.
authentication.verificationEmail: An email with a verification code has been sent.
authentication.noEmail: No email? Check your spam folder and confirm this email address is linked to your account.

description.bonus: If the sum of your points in the upper section is %{sum} or higher, you get a bonus of %{points}.
description.number: Get as many dice numbered %{number} as you can.
description.threeOfAKind: Get three dice with the same number. Like having three 4s.
description.fourOfAKind: Get four dice with the same number. Like having four 2s.
description.fullHouse: Have three dice with one number and two dice with another number. For instance, you could roll 3-3-3-5-5.
description.smallStraight: Get four dice in a row, like 2-3-4-5.
description.largeStraight: Get five dice in a row, like 2-3-4-5-6.
description.yacht: Roll five dice with the same number.
description.yachtBonus: If you roll another Yacht after already getting one, you'll earn an extra %{points}. But remember, you'll only get these points if you make a move that scores you points.
description.chance: Any combination of dice can be used.

yacht.scoreHint: Click on an orange number to claim those points!
yacht.holdHint: Click on a die to hold or release it.
yacht.earnsMatch: Earns the total of all matching dice.
yacht.earnsSum: Earns the total of all dice combined.
yacht.noPointsWarning: This move won't score you any points. There are other choices which do give you points.

poolFoul.CUSHION_HIT_MIN_ON_BREAK: Not enough balls hit a cushion after breaking. (Min. %{min})
poolFoul.CUSHION_HIT_INVALID: No valid ball hit a cushion while no ball was pocketed.
poolFoul.ILLEGAL_8_BALL_POCKET: %{name} pocketed the eight ball while committing a foul.
poolFoul.ILLEGAL_8_BALL_POCKET_TOO_SOON: %{name} pocketed the eight ball too early.

about.description: Bloob.io is a project of passion consisting of multiplayer browser games. Suggestions are always welcome!
about.licensing: Some games can be licensed for use on your site or platform (with custom adjustments). Get in touch in case you are interested.
